subject: Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Prokofey Drovichev, 73, turned down the money he was offered to relocate, hoping he would not have to move, and the Olympic Park development stopped just short of his home.
snippet: Prokofey Drovichev, 73, turned down the money he was offered to relocate, hoping he would not have to move, and the Olympic Park development stopped just short of his home.
